$DOT  Determination of the nearest levels (30min): Support (1.795); Resistance (1.847).  https://www.tradingview.com/chart/DOTUSDT/QKCcvzmC-DOT/   Public reporting on current and previous notes - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11D97htOm9TWjKGbf3dpMnrFNRJsmsfZIJvW58ZD7qbo/edit?gid=0#gid=0    #Trading  #Analysis

$DOT The price is moving in a descending channel on the 1-hour timeframe. It has reached the lower boundary and is heading towards breaking above it, with a retest of the upper boundary expected.

We have a downtrend on the RSI indicator, which has reached near the lower boundary, and an upward rebound is expected.

There is a key support zone in green at 1.77. The price has bounced from this zone multiple times and is expected to bounce again.

We have a trend towards stability above the 100-period moving average, as we are moving close to it, which supports the upward movement.

Entry price: 1.80
First target: 1.83
Second target: 1.86
Third target: 1.90

Stop loss: Below the support zone in green.

Don't forget a simple thing: capital management.
